attributes.action: Enforce Fox hunting ban which is being ignored by hunt people and our Police
attributes.additional_details: Its long over due, Police should enforce the law here, no matter who is involved in Fox /blood sport hunting. It could have been a long ago history, traditional dress up occasion But now it must be stopped altogether any form of pretence as in  scent laying and not actually hunting is not acceptable, and do they really believe the majority of the British people are that Stupid, this astounds the mind.
attributes.background: Police should enforce the ban on Fox hunting.  Then there would be no need for Sabs, trying to enforce the law, criminalised for believing in the protection of all animals from Abuse.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be an operational decision for the police and not the UK Government or Parliament.

Operational policing is overseen by police and crime commissioners. You can find out about the role of the police and crime commissioners and how to contact your local PCC here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/police-and-crime-commissioners-publications

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
